ComicInfo.Title: The Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dolphin enlists the help of Animal Man to help save the dolphins from a local menace slaughtering them for fun.
Animal Man joins up with Dolphin and some eco-terrorists to stop a mass slaughter of dolphins off the Faroe Islands.
Notes:
Ranked #95 in Wizard Magazine's list of "100 Best Single Issue Comics Since You Were Born".
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-06 14:31:04. [CVDB31597]
